name: 希希·斯顿
introduction: Slender and attractive 5'7" brunette Cece Stone was born on September 15, 1978 in Kansas. Of half Caucasian and half Vietnamese descent, Stone played the flute for seven years while growing up in Kansas. Moreover, Cece not only spent eight years playing shortstop for a softball team that won regionals and placed second in nationals, but also placed first in over twenty tae kwon do forms. (She's also an artist who has done work with oils, pencils, charcoals, and pastels.) Cece toiled away in several dead-end minimum wage-paying jobs prior to pursuing a career in the adult industry in 2008. Among the notable companies Stone has appeared in X-rated features for are 3rd Degree, Digital Sin, Filly Films, Evil Angel, White Ghetto, and Kick Ass Pictures. In addition, Cece has also worked for such adult websites as Naughty America and Blazing Pornstars.
